name: Luxury Guest Rooms
meta_title: Luxury Hotel Rooms | Keswick Hall in Charlottesville VA
meta_description: Luxury guest rooms at Keswick Hall in the Blue Ridge Mountains include light woods, timeless furnishings and state of the art amenities. Book your hotel stay now.
short_description: Awaken refreshed and renewed in any of our completely reimagined Estate Rooms. Adorned in light woods, timeless furnishings, and locally-inspired photography, the bedrooms feature luxurious Duxiana matresses as well as bespoke red flower bathroom amenities.
description:
Our reimagined, luxury guest rooms feature state-of-the-art appointments including an air purification HVAC system containing UV light technology and intelligent Lutron lighting that enables guests to customize privacy settings with the touch of a button. Our turndown service features delicious artisanal chocolates, custom-made for Keswick Hall. Accessible rooms are available.

Estate King Room
Our Estate Rooms are luxurious and completely renovated.

  • King bed
  • 420-500 sq. ft.
  • Dual, marble vanity bathroom with oversized walk-in shower
  • In-room safe
  • Mini refrigerator
  • 65” high-definition Smart TV

Deluxe King
Our spacious Deluxe Rooms are wrapped in charm and decorated in a warm color palette inspired by the local landscape.

  • King bed
  • 503-615 sq. ft.
  • Dual marble vanity bathroom with oversized walk-in shower
  • In-room safe
  • Mini refrigerator
  • 65” high-definition Smart TV

Deluxe King with Balcony or Terrace 
Our generously sized Deluxe Rooms with balconies provide sweeping mountain views, giving guests ample space to spread out and relax.

  • King bed
  • 480-700 sq. ft.
  • Dual, marble vanity bathroom with oversized walk-in shower
  • In-room safe
  • Mini refrigerator
  • 65” high-definition Smart TV
  • Mountain views
  • Private balcony or terrace with outdoor seating

Deluxe with Two Queen Beds
Our Deluxe Room with two Queen size beds provides plenty of breathing space to unwind after a busy day in the Virginia countryside.

  • Two Queen beds
  • 535-660 sq. ft.
  • Dual, marble vanity bathroom with oversized walk-in shower
  • In-room safe
  • Mini refrigerator
  • 65” high-definition Smart TV
  • Mountain views
  • Some rooms offer a private balcony or terrace with outdoor seating

Hotel Accessibility
Completely updated in 2020, Keswick Hall is compliant with the Department of Justice 2010 ADA Standards for Accessible Design. Accessible rooms are available and we welcome guests of all abilities. Our property descriptions aim to allow any visitor to make an informed decision on whether the hotel is an appropriate choice for their needs. We also invite you to view our Accessibility Statement.
